messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschooloing.comedy was this list
messages.messageBody:
kbcdlovejo@... wrote:
<<<The e-list is written as unschoolingdotcom@yahoogroups.com It became
unschoolingdotcomedy after an unusual doubt with some else who left in a huff
and started her own group.>>>

So, is unschoolingdotcom

and unschooling-dotcom the same e-list?

Rebecca

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschooloing.comedy was this list
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/11/2003 9:44:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... The e-list is written as unschoolingdotcom@yahoogroups.com It became unschoolingdotcomedy
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/11/2003 9:44:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
elfmama@... writes:

> Are you talking about the message boards at unschooling.com or something
> eles? I'm confused.

The e-list is written as unschoolingdotcom@yahoogroups.com It became
unschoolingdotcomedy after an unusual doubt with some else who left in a huff
and started her own group.

~Kelly

messages.msgSnippet: Kelly, I just love that term! I think that most people here just *get it*. Hey I Love it here. I can keep up. For now LOL! Barb E Don t judge each day by the
messages.messageBody:
Kelly,
I just love that term! I think that most people here just *get it*. Hey
I Love it here. I can keep up. For now LOL!


Barb E
"Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the
seeds you plant."

- Robert Louis Stevenson, Author
